sections.text: Title; intent and purpose of chapter; definitions; Board of Directors — established; composition; qualifications; advisors; terms; rules and regulations; compensation; duties and responsibilities; award of grants; separate nature of Fund; designation of tax refund as donation; investments; availability of funds for disbursement; reports of Board to Clearinghouse Committee [Repealed].Repealed by 77 Del. Laws, c. 351, § 1, effective July 12, 2010.
